name: ESPN Winter X-Games Snowboarding 2002
synopsis: With real professional snowboarders, boards, and other assorted gear, ESPN's Winter X Games Snowboarding 2002 is one exciting trick-based snowboarding game.  Starring gold medallists Peter Line as well as over 12 other top-notch snowboarders, this PS2 snow-shredder boasts pre- and post-race coverage, with statistics from the biggest names in the sport.
